entry.content:
What are your vices?
For me personally, compulsive snooping. I can't not snoop. When I start a job, I tell people, look I'm a snoop, don't leave files open a file on my computer and expect me not to read it, don't leave a confidential letter open on the conference table when we're meeting there, don't have a "private" conversation in the car with me, I will read/listen/etc. Can't help myself. My wife and I are the same way, and as a result we've always kept phone passwords because we just can't help ourselves and it's too much information to share.
